text.content:
NURSING NOTE 
    1930 - 0800
 
 
 
        See electronic flowsheet via CPRS Tools menu for VS, systems assessment, 
I/O, 
IV line assessment. 
 
        CODE status: 
Full Code / Full Resuscitative Efforts 
 
    Patient identification is confirmed by an accurate secured armband
         YES
 
    Are restraints in use? 
         No.
 
    Has there been a FALL in the past 48 hours? 
         No
P: pt at risk for falls
 
I: pt. oriented to unit, call light and encouraged to use it.
 
E: Pt. A&Ox3, however throughout the night seems somewhat confused at 
times- VSS except pt with slight temp at beginning of shift- 100.4,
however has been afebrile since without intervention. Pt also tachycardic
t/o shift- on telemetry. Patient was noted to be sinus rhythm per
telemetry at beginning of shift. Vitals stable except for O2 sat low at
high 80s at 0500 - placed back on 2 liters per NC O2. MRSA negative. Pt
wishes to not have compressions, but yes to intubation- no bracelet placed
on patient. Lung sounds diminished t/o all lobes, active bowel sounds, LBM
11/17 per patient report. continent clear yellow urine per patient report.
Regular diet. 20g to Left hand/wrist flushing well. Received 500 ml Normal
saline bolus. tylenol available prn. blood cultures drawn per ED nurse 
per report. pt wishing to sleep, states has no pain and no other 
complaints.
BED BUG ASSESSMENT: 
Patient has been assessed for the presence of bed bugs and/or bed bug bites. No 
evidence of bed bugs noted.
PATIENT EDUCATION
   BARRIERS TO LEARNING
   Patient:  No observed barriers to learning 
   Comments: 
   Family/Significant Other: 
   Comments: 
   Information Taught: 
   To Whom: Patient
 
   Method:  verbal 
 
   Learner Response:  Indicates Understanding 
 
   Comments:  ENCOURAGED TO USE CALL LIGHT FOR ASSISTANCE/GETTING UP
MORSE FALL SCALE
 
   History of Falls  00 Yes
   Secondary Dx      15 Yes
   Ambulatory Aid    00 Crutches/Cane/Walker
   IV/Hep Lock       20 Yes
   Gait/Transfer     10 Weak
   Mental Status      0 Oriented to own ability
 
   TOTAL SCORE:      45
 
GENITOURINARY 
Voiding without difficulty, BRP.
text.author: NURSE,ONE
